top_stories.title: India orders Musk’s X to fix Grok over ‘obscene’ AI content
top_stories.description: India's IT ministry has given X 72 hours to submit an action-taken report.

top_stories.title: Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for resilience
top_stories.description: As enterprises accelerate their move toward autonomous workflows powered by artificial intelligence, the urgent need for robust AI agent governance has become a critical operational mandate. An agent’s potential relies on the fact that they can perform higher-level tasks, including assuming identities and executing business processes. But if that is compromised, attackers have effectively hijacked […] The post Faster agents, bigger blast radius: Why agent governance is the new control plane for...

top_stories.title: Equity’s 2026 Predictions: AI Agents, Blockbuster IPOs, and the Future of VC
top_stories.description: TechCrunch’s Equity crew is bringing 2025 to a close and getting ahead on the year to come with our annual predictions episode! Hosts Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, and Rebecca Bellan were joined by Build Mode host Isabelle Johannessen to dissect the year’s biggest tech developments, from mega AI funding rounds that defied expectations to the rise of “physical AI,” and make […]

top_stories.title: Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents
top_stories.description: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. Instead of forcing a model to read a giant prompt in one pass, RLMs treat the prompt as an external environment and let the model decide how to inspect it with code, then recursively call […] The post Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents appeared first on MarkTechPost.

top_stories.title: Foundation Models as the Backbone of Next-Gen AI Platforms
top_stories.description: Foundation models as the backbone of next-gen AI platforms, reshaping enterprise AI architecture, governance, and scale.
